gaia::base::StringArray * mpConboPickerArray

Detailed Description

A widget that displays one child at a time and lets the user pick among them.

The items in the ComboPicker come from the provider associated with this widget.

  class MyComboClickListener : public gaia::ui::ComboClickListener
  {
      public:
            Scene* mScene;
            gaia::core::Page* mPage;
            MyComboClickListener(Scene* pScene) { mScene = pScene; };
            MyComboClickListener(EmptyPageTest* pPage) { mPage = pPage; };
            ~MyComboClickListener() {};
            void onClick(int32_t position, long long id, const gaia::base::String& str){
                printf("Position=%d ID=%lld, str=[%s]", position, id, str.string());
            };
  };
    
  void EmptyPageTest::onInit(Persistence* const p)
  {
      gaia::ui::LinearController* mpLCtrl = new gaia::ui::LinearController(static_cast<Page*>(this));
      mpLCtrl->setOrientation(gaia::ui::LinearController::VERTICAL);
      
      gaia::base::StringArray instringArray(12);
      instringArray.replaceAt("January", 0);
      instringArray.replaceAt("February", 1);
      instringArray.replaceAt("March", 2);
      instringArray.replaceAt("April", 3);
      instringArray.replaceAt("May", 4);
      instringArray.replaceAt("June", 5);
      instringArray.replaceAt("July", 6);
      instringArray.replaceAt("August", 7);
      instringArray.replaceAt("September", 8);
      instringArray.replaceAt("October", 9);
      instringArray.replaceAt("November", 10);
      instringArray.replaceAt("December", 11);
      
      gaia::ui::ComboPicker* mpComboTest = new gaia::ui::ComboPicker(this);
      
      gaia::ui::ComboClickListener *mpListener = new MyComboClickListener(this);
      mpComboTest->setListener(mpListener);
      
      gaia::base::String str("Test:ComboPicker Title");
      mpComboTest->setTitle(str);
      GLOG(LOG_TAG, LOGINFO, "Title=%s", mpComboTest->getTitle().string());
      mpComboTest->setItemList(instringArray);
      mpLCtrl->addWidget(mpComboTest);
      mScene->attachController(mpLCtrl);
      mScene->setupSceneLayout();
  }
